AxTableField.Name: McsAiEndPointKey
AxTableField.HelpText: This is the key provided for your endpoint whenlooking at the All Azure OpenAI & AI Service resources page.
AxTableField.Label: MCS AI endpoint key

AxTableField.Name: McsAiEndPointDeployment
AxTableField.HelpText: The name of the deployment you want to use from your Azure OpenAI resource. e.g. gpt-35-turbo
AxTableField.Label: MCS AI endpoint deployment

AxTableField.Name: McsAiProductTranslationLanguages
AxTableField.HelpText: A comma separated list of language Ids to translate to at product release
AxTableField.Label: MCS AI Product translation languages
